title: What kind of calligraphy is this? (NOT font ID)
content:
The attached image is the work of designer David Rudnick, however I recently stumbled across a font in development on either this site or a different typography forum using this style as well, but I can't find it anywhere. If you know what I'm talking about a link would be cool, but since I have no other details, that's not the point of this post.

What style of lettering is this? The super-elongated, overly ornamented letterforms that intertwine with each other are so beautiful. I would love to learn more about it but have no information - anything would be appreciated.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-12-26 at 6.04.55 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-12-26%20at%206.04.55%20PM.png) | 413.54 KB |
author: 1000000usd

comments.content:
There is a cyrillic super elongated style called vyaz [http://typophile.com/node/56681](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/http:/typophile.com/node/56681 "http://typophile.com/node/56681"). I don't know for the latin alphabet.

[http://typophile.com/node/43534](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/http:/typophile.com/node/43534 "http://typophile.com/node/43534")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/14390](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/http:/typophile.com/node/14390 "http://typophile.com/node/14390")  
 [http://typophile.com/node/14377](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/http:/typophile.com/node/14377 "http://typophile.com/node/14377")

Related: [http://typophile.com/node/59857](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/http:/typophile.com/node/59857 "http://typophile.com/node/59857")

I recognized the beautiful lettering as originating from Vyaz, but did not know it was so-called. I once painted a Russian icon (copied from an original) together with the inscription without being able to read it.

Here is more on the subject:  
 [https://russianicons.wordpress.com/tag/icon-inscriptions/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417065307/https:/russianicons.wordpress.com/tag/icon-inscriptions/ "https://russianicons.wordpress.com/tag/icon-inscriptions/")
